resources.string: One hot day, there was a thirsty crow, looking for water everywhere. For long time, he couldn\'t find any and felt very weak.
He decided to rest on a tree. Suddenly, he saw a pot at some distance.
He flew towards the pot to drink water.

Yes, he could see some water inside the pot! The crow tried to reach the water, but sadly, he found that the water level was too low. Then he tried to push the pot to tilt for the water to flow out but the pot was too heavy.

The crow thought hard for a while. Then looking around,he saw some pebbles. He suddenly had a good idea. He started picking up the pebbles one by one, dropping each into the pot. \n(Hint: Touch the picture to help the crow drop pebbles.)
As more and more pebbles filled the pot, the water level kept rising. Soon it was high enough for the crow to drink.
The crow drank the water and flew away happily. \n\nMoral of the story: Where there is a will, there is a way!!!

This interactive story telling application narrates one of the best moral stories. 

This beautifully illustrated story uses animated scenes, on click animations and audios to capture the interest of the reading audience. 

The application gives the option to read the story yourself or hit the 'Play' button to let the app read it for you. This great story inspires children and adults to learn respect, good values, ethics, morals and good behavior.
